cafe.name: Classic Cappuccino

cafe.name: Espresso Shot
cafe.description: A bold, concentrated shot of pure espresso — for true coffee lovers.

cafe.name: Mocha Latte
cafe.description: A delicious blend of espresso, chocolate, and steamed milk topped with whipped cream.

cafe.name: Vanilla Cold Brew
cafe.description: Smooth cold brew coffee infused with vanilla for a refreshing flavor.

cafe.name: Chai Latte
cafe.description: A spiced black tea blend with steamed milk, featuring cinnamon, cardamom, and cloves.

cafe.name: Green Tea
cafe.description: Creamy steamed milk with finely ground Japanese matcha for a vibrant, earthy drink.

cafe.name: Hot Chocolate
cafe.description: Rich and creamy cocoa topped with whipped cream and chocolate drizzle.

cafe.name: Hazelnut Latte
cafe.description: Espresso with steamed milk and a hint of nutty hazelnut sweetness.

cafe.name: Flat White
cafe.description: Smooth microfoam milk poured over rich espresso for a silky finish.

cafe.name: Iced Vanilla Chai
cafe.description: Cold spiced chai tea blended with vanilla and served over ice.

cafe.name: Turmeric Latte
cafe.description: Golden milk latte with turmeric, ginger, and honey for a cozy, spiced drink.
